basic.description:
Content: Introduction to mathematical discourse and proof methods. Sets, functions, sequences, and relations. Properties of the integers. Induction. Equivalence relations. Linear and partial orderings.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Discrete Mathematics for Computing l

extra.enrollment_requirement: One-way exclusion    May not be taken with or after CISC203
